section.heading: Assessment of insurers.
section.text: *NOTE: This codification is not the most current, due to recent law changes. To see the current law (including emergency and temporary legislation, if relevant) click this link: Current Version*
The Mayor shall assess all insurers to cover all the costs of administering this chapter. The Mayor shall promulgate regulations to determine the assessment formula.

annotations.annotation: Delegation of authority pursuant to D.C. Law 12-274, the “Health Benefits Plan Members Bill of Rights Act of 1998”, see Mayor’s Order 99-159, October 13, 1999 ( 46 DCR 8842).
